document.full_text: up to 100,000 people protested at the wisconsin state capitol on saturday against a new law curbing the union rights of public workers that is seen as one of the biggest challenges in decades facing u.s. organized labor.
document.title: up to 100,000 protest wisconsin law curbing unions
lines_and_colors: up to 100,000 people protested at the wisconsin state capitol on saturday against a new law curbing the union rights of public workers that is seen as one of the biggest challenges in decades facing u.s. organized labor.
